message.entry: Unable to parse input options for ''{0}'': ''{1}''
First argument must be a valid command.
Invalid command: ''{0}''.
''{0}'' must be one of these types: {1}
Value must be text.
Value must be scalar text.
Value must be non-missing text.
Value must be non-empty text.
Value of ''{0}'' must be non-empty text.
Value of ''{0}'' must be non-empty scalar text.
'InPlace' must be true when 'Editable' is true.
Package must be a folder that is not part of any known repositories when either 'InPlace' or 'Editable' is true.
Specifying 'Authoring' with any of 'InPlace', 'Editable' or 'PathPosition' is not supported.
Arguments ''{0}'' and ''{1}'' must have same sizes.
Package specifier is not specified.
''{0}'' must be path to a folder.
''{0}'' must be of type ''{1}'' or convertible to ''{1}''.
'VersionRange' value must contain a version range.
'CompatibleWithRelease' value must be in the format R20xx[a|b] or semantic version format major.minor.patch-prerelease.
First argument must be scalar Package object.
Package specifier is empty.

entry.note: Used as a hole in InvalidPackageSpecifier

message.entry: Specify either name or id.
Invalid package specifier ''{0}''. {1}
Invalid package identifier ''{0}''. {1}
Specifying both version string and ''{0}'' is not supported.
Operator ''{0}'' is not defined for type ''{1}''.
Dependency ''{0}'' does not exist. Updating non existent dependency is not supported.
Package does not have any dependencies. Updating non existent dependency is not supported.
Value must be scalar.
Value must be non-missing.
Version {0} is not a valid semantic version.
Build value {0} is not valid.
Prerelease value {0} is not valid.
